## ReaddirDirentCallback type

Callback for `fs.readdir` when `withFileTypes` is true

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ReaddirDirentCallback = (error: NodeJS.ErrnoException | null, files: fs.Dirent[]) => void;
```
